name: Carrot’s Season
description:
made in 2 weeks for Cozy Autmn Game jam !

Farm , grow , sell ! 

You bought a house on a big city ! But you have to pay the loan before going into it !

You you came back to your fathers carrot farm to make some money !

“Tutorial is on the games’ main menu”

Java 11+ needed to run the game : https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/downloads/
